devdoc.details: This contract facilitates the swapping of ERC721 tokens for ERC20 tokens.

nftToSell(uint256,address,uint256,addres.details: Allows an owner of an ERC721 token to set its selling price.

params._nftAddress: The address of the ERC721 contract.
params._price: The price in ERC20 tokens at which the ERC721 token will be sold.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token used for pricing.
params._tokenId: The ID of the ERC721 token.

swap(uint256,address,address,uint256).details: Allows a user to swap ERC721 tokens for ERC20 tokens based on the set price._tokenAmount parameter was added to avoid Front running.

params._nftAddress: The address of the ERC721 contract.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token used for swapping.
params._tokenAmount: The amount of ERC20 tokens required for the swap.
params._tokenId: The ID of the ERC721 token to be swapped.

devdoc.title: SwapContract
